group_1.narration: My family runs a used book store in@Kamihama called "Natsume Books".

group_1.textCenter: My father runs the store and my mother@teaches Japanese at a junior high school.
I love to read, and they@both had a big part in that.

group_1.textLeft: Dad, I read that book you recommended.@I couldn't put it down!

group_1.textRight: You mean Daihachiro Furuyashiki's@The Melancholy of the Sugar Glider?

group_1.textLeft: Even though it's a mystery, it had all@these sci-fi and historical elements to it...
Everything about it was just great!
If you find another book you@think I might like, keep it for me.

group_1.textRight: Actually, how about this one?@It's another one by Furuyashiki.

group_1.textLeft: The Dreadful Flying Squirrel?@[chara:301101:cheek_1]It sounds promising!

group_1.narration: It might not seem like much, but@I couldn't have asked for more.
I could visit any world I wanted@in the pages of a book...
Each turn of the page took me on@a new and wonderful journey...
I always had new discoveries@to make, and I was very happy...

group_1.textLeft: This store was my father's,@I couldn't possibly...
No, wait! Don't hang up!@Let me explain... Ah...
Huh? Oh, Kako...@I didn't see you there...
Never mind.@It's nothing you should worry yourself about.

group_1.narration: That one phone call was what@set everything in motion...
It wasn't long until Natsume Books@came into real danger...
